name: DeepO
description:
Deepo is a snappy platformer in which your character dives in an adventure into the depths of the ocean. Take a deep breath, dash and manage your air to overcome the challenges, and whenever things become too hard, just relax and breathe deeper, everything will be fine :)

Controls KeyboardGamepad (Xbox/PS4)ActionArrow keysD-PadMovement
  Jump/Dash BreatheStart/OptionsRestart Level AUTHORS

This game was developed for the Ludum Dare 48 with the theme "Deeper and Deeper" by: 

  • Shovi Medo
  • Rodrysson (@pituandanti)
  • Alejandro de Cea (@ethereaxel)
THIRD PARTY ASSETS
  • Music: 'Aquatic Planet' by David Celeste
  • Font: 'Early GameBoy' by Jimmy Campbell
CHANGELOG
  • Ludum dare submission
  • Fixed first tutorial not showing
  • Fixed typos in some texts
  • Added camera shake
  • Added background art
